name: Pulp Adventures - A PUSH Powered game
name_original: Pulp Adventures - A PUSH Powered game
description:
The setting:

After the Great War the future looks so bright and roaring. There are many places yet to be visited, many legends yet to be told and many treasures yet to be discovered. Your adventorous soul is in seek of fortune and glory but many dangers await the foolish and the unprepared. Pack your things, we're leaving on an adventure!

The mission:

The Sisterhood of the Sinister Serpent (SSS) has just stolen the Antikythera mechanism from the National Archaeological Museum, in Athens, Greece. Top men from The Government think they are trying to use it to find "The Head of Medusa", a legendary weapon that would make them unstoppable. You must find Angela Ophiouchos, an expert on the mechanism and convince her to help you stop them before it is too late.

The game:



Pulp adventures is a game powered by PUSH SRD by Cezar Capacle.

This work is based on the Push SRD, developed, authored, and edited by Cezar Capacle (https://capacle.itch.io/), and licensed for our use under the Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 International license (https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/).
